title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - See The Future of Cloud Defense: Agentic Cloud Security (AIM288)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 洞见云防御的未来：智能体云安全 (AIM288)
abstract: With too much data, too little context, and not enough time, cloud security leaders and practitioners struggle to identify and resolve real business risk. Agentic AI is changing the game. Intelligent agents that think, reason, and act on your behalf take on the complexity so you can focus on what really matters. In this talk, see how Sysdig Sage™ helps secure your AWS cloud like an AI-powered teammate that reasons about business context to drive better outcomes. You'll get a firsthand look at how Sysdig accelerates risk identification and remediation, with a live demo of agentic cloud security in action. This presentation is brought to you by Sysdig, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 面对海量数据、有限上下文和紧迫时间，云安全领导者和从业人员难以识别和解决真正的业务风险。智能体AI正在改变这一局面。能够代表您思考、推理和行动的智能代理承担了复杂性，让您可以专注于真正重要的事情。在本次演讲中，了解Sysdig Sage™如何像一个具备AI能力的队友一样保护您的AWS云，通过理解业务上下文来推动更好的结果。您将亲眼看到Sysdig如何加速风险识别和修复，并观看智能体云安全的现场演示。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Sysdig提供。
